attributes.action: War veteran Captain Tom Moore nominated for a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: As a serving war veteran as a captain for his country & raised more than five million pounds for the NHS I feel it would be a fantastic honour of a man of 99 years of age to be put forward for a knighthood
attributes.background: Nominate war veteran Captain Tom Moore for a knighthood for raising over 5 million pounds for the NHS & for his service for our country

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
